languages.text: "Постойте!" {n}Кассия взывает не только к вам, но и стоящим вокруг эльдарам.{/n} "Я не могу изменить прошлое, это правда. Как и то, что мой Дом навсегда заклеймен позором, насланным тщеславием Тисифоны Орселлио. Но здесь и сегодня нам под силу изменить будущее, прервать бесконечные страдания, в которых погрязли и ваши, и мои сородичи!"

traits.locale_text: "Постойте!" {n}Кассия взывает не только к вам, но и стоящим вокруг эльдарам.{/n} "Я не могу изменить прошлое, это правда. Как и то, что мой Дом навсегда заклеймен позором, насланным тчеславием Тисифоны Орселлио. Но здесь и сегодня нам под силу изменить будущее, прервать бесконечные страдания, в которых погрязли и ваши, и мои сородичи!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wait!" {n}Cassia's appeal is addressed both to you and the Aeldari surrounding you.{/n} "I cannot change the past, it is true. Nor can I change the fact that my House is forever tainted with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet, all of us here today have the power to change the future and halt the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"
languages.original_text: "Постойте!" {n}Кассия взывает не только к вам, но и стоящим вокруг эльдарам.{/n} "Я не могу изменить прошлое, это правда. Как и то, что мой Дом навсегда заклеймен позором, насланным тщеславием Тисифоны Орселлио. Но здесь и сегодня нам под силу изменить будущее, прервать бесконечные страдания, в которых погрязли и ваши, и мои сородичи!"

And neither can I change the fact that my House is forever branded with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet all of us here today, we have the power to change the future, end the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Nor can I change the fact that my House is forever tainted with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet, all of us here today have the power to change the future and halt the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「待って！」{n}カシアの訴えが、あなたと周囲のアエルダリ双方に届く。{/n}「あたくしに過去は変えられない、そのとおりです。ティシフォン・オーセリオのヒュブリスに起因する不名誉がオーセリオ家を永遠にむしばむ事実も変えられません。ですが、今ここにいる我々は皆、未来を変え、あなたとあたくしの、双方の同胞を引きずり込む終わらない苦しみを断つ力を持っています！」
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Cassia's appeal is addressed both to you and the Aeldari surrounding you.{/n} "I cannot change the past, it is true. Nor can I change the fact that my House is forever tainted with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet, all of us here today have the power to change the future and halt the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"

traits.locale_text: 「待って！」{n}カシアの訴えが、あなたと周囲のアエルダリ双方に届く。{/n}「あたくしに過去は変えられない、そのとおりです。ティシフォン・オーセリオのヒュブリスに起因する不名誉がオーセリオ家を永遠にむしばむ事実も変えられません。ですが、今ここにいる我々は皆、未来を変え、あなたとあたくしの、双方の同胞を引きずり込む終わらない苦しみを断つ力を持っています！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “等等！”{n}卡西娅朝你和你身边的丑角剧团喊了起来。{/n}“我无法改变过去发生的事情，这是事实。提西福涅·奥赛罗的傲慢行为，为我们的家族带来了永远无法抹消的污点，我无法改变这样的现状。但现在，只要我们齐心协力，我们就有能力改变未来，彻底结束你我族人之间无尽的苦难！”
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Cassia's appeal is addressed both to you and the Aeldari surrounding you.{/n} "I cannot change the past, it is true. Nor can I change the fact that my House is forever tainted with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet, all of us here today have the power to change the future and halt the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"

traits.locale_text: “等等！”{n}卡西娅朝你和你身边的丑角剧团喊了起来。{/n}“我无法改变过去发生的事情，这是事实。提西福涅·奥塞罗的傲慢行为，为我们的家族带来了永远无法抹消的污点，我无法改变这样的现状。但现在，只要我们齐心协力，我们就有能力改变未来，彻底结束你我族人之间无尽的苦难！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Attendez ! » {n}La supplication de Cassia s'adresse aussi bien à vous qu'aux Aeldaris qui vous entourent.{/n} « Je ne peux pas changer le passé, de même que je ne peux pas racheter le déshonneur dont l'orgueil démesuré de Tisiphone Orsellio a couvert ma maison. Et pourtant, nous tous, ici, nous avons le pouvoir de changer l'avenir et de mettre un terme aux souffrances de nos deux peuples ! »
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Cassia's appeal is addressed both to you and the Aeldari surrounding you.{/n} "I cannot change the past, it is true. Nor can I change the fact that my House is forever tainted with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet, all of us here today have the power to change the future and halt the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"

traits.locale_text: « Attendez ! » {n}La supplication de Cassia s'adresse aussi bien à vous qu'aux Aeldaris qui vous entourent.{/n} « Je ne peux pas changer le passé, de même que je ne peux pas racheter le déshonneur dont l'orgueil démesuré de Tisiphone Orsellio a couvert ma maison. Et pourtant, nous tous, ici, nous avons le pouvoir de changer l'avenir et de mettre un terme aux souffrances de nos deux peuples ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Alto!». {n}El grito de Cassia va dirigido tanto a ti como a los Aeldari que os rodean.{/n} «No puedo cambiar el pasado, es cierto. Ni tampoco la lacra imborrable que la soberbia de Tisiphone Orsellio ha grabado a fuego en mi casa. ¡Sin embargo, todos los aquí presentes tenemos el poder de cambiar el futuro y poner fin al sufrimiento interminable que ahoga tanto a mi gente como a la vuestra!».
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Cassia's appeal is addressed both to you and the Aeldari surrounding you.{/n} "I cannot change the past, it is true. Nor can I change the fact that my House is forever tainted with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet, all of us here today have the power to change the future and halt the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto!». {n}El grito de Cassia va dirigido tanto a ti como a los Aeldari que os rodean.{/n} «No puedo cambiar el pasado, es cierto. Ni tampoco la lacra imborrable que la soberbia de Tisiphone Orsellio ha grabado a fuego en mi casa. ¡Sin embargo, todos los aquí presentes tenemos el poder de cambiar el futuro y poner fin al sufrimiento interminable que ahoga tanto a mi gente como a la vuestra!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wartet!" {n}Cassias Appell ist sowohl an dich als auch an die Aeldari um Euch herum gerichtet.{/n} "Ich kann die Vergangenheit nicht ändern, das ist wahr. Und ich kann auch die Tatsache nicht ändern, dass mein Haus für immer mit dem Makel der Schande gestraft sein wird, der durch Tisiphone Orsellios Hybris entstanden ist. Und doch haben wir alle, die wir heute hier sind, die Kraft, die Zukunft zu ändern und das endlose Leid zu durchbrechen, in dem sowohl Eure Sippe als auch die meine ertrinken!"
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Cassia's appeal is addressed both to you and the Aeldari surrounding you.{/n} "I cannot change the past, it is true. Nor can I change the fact that my House is forever tainted with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet, all of us here today have the power to change the future and halt the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"

traits.locale_text: "Wartet!" {n}Cassias Appell ist sowohl an dich als auch an die Aeldari um Euch herum gerichtet.{/n} "Ich kann die Vergangenheit nicht ändern, das ist wahr. Und ich kann auch die Tatsache nicht ändern, dass mein Haus für immer mit dem Makel der Schande gestraft sein wird, der durch Tisiphone Orsellios Hybris entstanden ist. Und doch haben wir alle, die wir heute hier sind, die Kraft, die Zukunft zu ändern und das endlose Leid zu durchbrechen, in dem sowohl Eure Sippe als auch die meine ertrinken!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Dur!" {n}Cassia, hem sana hem de etrafınızı saran Aeldarilere yakarıyor.{/n} "Geçmişi değiştiremem, o kadarı doğru. Tisiphone Orsellio'nun kibri yüzünden Hanemin ebediyen böyle kara bir leke taşıyacağı da doğrudur. Lakin bugün burada toplanan herkesin geleceği değiştirmesi ve hem sizin hem de bizim soydaşlarımızın çektiği sonsuz ızdırabı durdurması mümkündür!"
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Cassia's appeal is addressed both to you and the Aeldari surrounding you.{/n} "I cannot change the past, it is true. Nor can I change the fact that my House is forever tainted with disgrace born of Tisiphone Orsellio's hubris. Yet, all of us here today have the power to change the future and halt the unending suffering that is drowning both your kin and mine!"

traits.locale_text: "Dur!" {n}Cassia'nın yakarışı, hem sana hem de etrafınızı saran Aeldarilere.{/n} "Geçmişi değiştiremem; o kadarı doğru. Tisiphone Orsellio'nun kibri yüzünden Hanemin ebediyen böyle kara bir leke taşıyacağı da doğrudur. Lakin bugün burada toplanan herkesin geleceği değiştirmesi ve hem sizin hem de bizim soydaşlarımızın çektiği sonsuz ızdırabı durdurması mümkündür!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
